Laws binding the worlds governments to be held responsible if found in anyway involved with damaging the Earth.

Just a list:

Sky Pollution
Soil pollution
Deforestation
Water pollution
Animal protection and their environment
Impact of war and chemicals used
Protection of native people and their homeland
Drilling responsibility
Sea condition protected
human population impact

These are just some examples of laws that should be used to protect all life on this planet and including the Living Planet herself.

I ask for a new governing body of lawyers environmentists scientists biologist etc.
They will have powers to punish any country found in serious breach of these laws.

It is fact that our current way of life will end all life on this unique planet.
Profit before life should be forbidden.


Earth Crimes and the Earth is a lifeform and has the most extreme right to be protected then anything else.
